QuestData.Title: A Piece of the Puzzle
QuestData.Description: I... I remember now. Watch Commander Branson told us to stay in the inn... he said we would be safe here.$B$BThen...$B$BThen that THING broke through and slaughtered everyone!$B$BThe last thing I remember seeing was it descending into the larder.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill the Horrific Aberration in the basement of the inn.
QuestData.RewardText: I will convince the others of our fate. There's no denying it anymore.
